attributes.action: Ban on Shops and Supermarkets selling all fireworks
attributes.additional_details: Please stop fireworks being sold to the general public in shops and supermarkets, they are very dangerous and cause problems with animals and children and cause a cost to the emergency services. Fireworks on Nov 5th at organized shows with first aiders at hand, but we have to suffer fireworks from mid Oct to mid Nov at all times day and night. There should be a fined for anyone using fireworks at home or in a public place.
